meanings.definition: A large printed picture or notice used for decoration or advertisement.
meanings.sent1: I hung up a colorful poster of a kitten in my room.
meanings.sent2: The movie theater had posters of upcoming films on the walls.
meanings.sent3: The poster of a dancing banana made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a bright poster in a sea of frowns.
meanings.sent5: The poster of the beach made me long for a vacation.

meanings.definition: A person who posts something online.
meanings.sent1: The social media poster shared funny memes with friends.
meanings.sent2: The forum had many posters discussing various topics.
meanings.sent3: The poster accidentally posted a picture of their cat upside down.
meanings.sent4: She was a poster of positivity in a world of negativity.
meanings.sent5: The online poster's words resonated with many readers.
